comments.html:
Ian; thanks for the update. Isn't the config of the X2- router in the wiki supposed to have 'remote-as 65101' as the BGP debug show in the path-list No it lists remote-as 65000?
Keep up the good work.
comments.name: steve

comments.html: You're absolutely correct - somehow I've managed to remove the EBGP neighbor when cleaning the configuration file  :'( Fixed.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
